name: Happy Quadro
description:
This game was made at Global Game Jam 2019
#FGJ19 #GGJ19

Available also at: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/happy-quadro

Credits

Art, design, code: Annakaisa Kultima

Sound and music: Lauri Leskinen

Ideas and help: Jasmine, Elina, Riikka, Chris <3

Parts of the graphics were made for ICGJ 2019 conference and made available for everyone to use for their Global Game Jam games. Tweet the game links if you used the graphics to @aakoo. The graphics are available here (let me know by a tweet if you use them for a jam game before March 16th 2019): 

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/0ftn7r1inf7n1yc/AAByvLsh9-QuW-Xt2e4iQLCXa?dl=0
